entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
